title: Scalar Multiplication of a 3D Vector
description:
SGN calculates the Signum of X. 
SGN = +1 if X > 0
SGN = 0 if X = 0
SGN = -1 if X < 0
name: V3_SMUL

input.name: A
input.description: The 3-dimensional vector that is to be multiplied by the scalar.

input.name: M
input.description: The scalar multiplier to be applied to each component of the vector.

output.name: V3_SMUL
output.description: The resulting vector after multiplication by the scalar.

fields.name: X
fields.description: The x-component of the resulting vector.

fields.name: Y
fields.description: The y-component of the resulting vector.

fields.name: Z
fields.description: The z-component of the resulting vector.

return_value.description: The resulting vector formed by multiplying each component of the input vector by the scalar.

fields.name: X
fields.description: The x-component of the resulting vector.

fields.name: Y
fields.description: The y-component of the resulting vector.

fields.name: Z
fields.description: The z-component of the resulting vector.
